Texting_Sequence_1: ^hey Emerald! I hope you’re doing well [emoji:smile]
^sorry, I know it’s really late lol
^do you remember those Vocaloid lyric videos we made back in high school?
^I just found a sketch of Memi in one of my notebooks
^Amika!!! hey, it’s nice to hear from you!
^I could never forget our little sun-shaped guy!
^he’s still the mascot of my Vocaloid acct on YouTube
^the one where we uploaded our song “Memories”!

c-0: ^I was up every night animating the video. I barely slept that month [emoji:joy]
^that I worked super-hard, or that I barely slept? [emoji:fearful]
c-1: ^I wish I could say I had your epic composition skills [emoji:smile]
^hey you were up every night after school animating the lyric video for a MONTH. that means it’s your song too!
g-0: ^you were a great artist even back in high school. no wonder you got that awesome job in Burbank right out of college [emoji:heart]

s: ^it was hard, but I did it

c-3: ^the interview process was a little intense, but I pulled through in the end [emoji:smile]
c-4: ^seriously, don’t make me come all the way over there [emoji:mad]
^ok ok, I’m super great and I deserve this extremely cool job, please don’t hurt me haha

g-1: ^it’s really nice of you to text. I had no idea you were still thinking about all those old lyric videos we made
^Memi was adorable. I couldn’t have asked you to draw me a better mascot [emoji:heart]
^tbh I actually haven’t made a new Vocaloid song in forever lol
^how come? you always loved playing around with Miku, GUMI, and all their voicebanks
^I guess I haven’t really used voice synthesizers for anything since I started music school
^I saw you’ve kept up your Vocaloid blog, though!
^I did! I was just writing a post now actually [emoji:smile]
^there’s this track by nostraightanswer that I LOVE. the lyrics really get me
^but anyways! hbu? are you still listening to Crusher, Deco*27 and everybody?

c-5: ^I just don’t have time for that kind of stuff anymore
^totally, I'm super busy these days too! but always glad to keep you in the loop lol
^I appreciate it :) I'm pretty far out of the loop at this point though. like deep space
^I'll rope you back in! like how they space lassoed matt damon in that movie
^haha good to know you'll always catch me up
c-6: ^I wish I could keep up with it more. I wouldn’t know any new songs unless you posted them haha
^yeah I bet you’re busy living it up in Cali!
^hardly lol more like busy trying to stay afloat

g-3: ^I'm really sorry I haven’t messaged more often.
^I bumped into your mom when I was visiting home and she says you’re really busy
^and how’s California so far? don't tell me you say "stoked" and "beggle" now :O

c-7: ^so great you’ll never come back haha
^sorry, I wanted to make it over the summer!
^everyone’s putting in extra time to push out the new season of Blue Star: Alcyone. I couldn’t get free [emoji:fearful]
^I’m just giving you a hard time! maybe we can meet up over Thanksgiving?
^my folks are going to visit me out here actually… they want to escape the Illinois cold for a bit
^oh that sounds fun. but I’m coming after you for that raincheck!
c-8: ^everything's crazy. I haven’t been able to think straight or take a breath
^I’m alright, it’s just that working at an animation studio takes up so much mental space
^I feel like I’m playing catch up with everyone else and just trying to make it till the next deadline
^I have no idea why they picked me. I might not be cut out for this
^I felt the same about school you know
^are you kidding? or did I dream up all those amazing Chicago Youth Symphony recitals?
^speaking of throwbacks! that feels like forever ago [emoji:joy]
c-9: ^oh my gosh no I have no chill lately
^um when did you have chill to begin with??

g-4: ^how about you? how are things back in Illinois?
^did you do anything fun during break?
^your music program had fall break already right?
^oh yeah I didn’t do anything though lol

c-10: ^lol as if! sleep is for the weak
c-11: ^there are no breaks after graduation, you know
^thanks mom lol I just didn't feel like doing anything special

g-5: ^what else are you doing this semester?
^I mean not much compared to you!!
^drawing all day and spotting celebrities, I’m jealous haha
^no no it’s not like that! I’m just a prop artist, I don’t get to meet the voice talent. and all the spottings are over in silver lake xD
^you're closer to your dream than a lot of people get! you’re totally on your way to being a great director
^directing might not be my dream anymore actually

c-13: ^it's harder to be disappointed if you reset your expectations
^hmm. does giving up actually save you the disappointment or just front load it?
^like are you actually changing your mind or are you letting your fear make the decision?
^if you don’t want to be a director anymore, that's totally your choice! plans change
^but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it.
^you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)
c-14: ^I'm nothing like the directors at my studio
^I know I'm only starting out but I just feel invisible sometimes. I don't know why anyone would care what I have to say
^isn't it worth sharing your stories even if it feels like no one's listening?
^if you don’t want to be a director anymore, that's totally your choice! plans change.
^but I hope you’re not counting yourself out because you think you CAN’T do it.
^you’re an amazing artist, Amika! you have so much to be proud of already. if it means anything, I’M proud of you :)
^oh wow that means the world to me!! I appreciate you saying that Emerald, you always know how to cheer me up :)

g-6: ^you have nothing to be sorry for!
^well if I ever do direct a film you’re my first choice for music! I know you would write a killer score
^have you been working on any new songs for class?
^not really - I’ve actually been spending more time listening lately.
^like I was saying, I’m working on a blog post right now about nostraightanswer. have you heard of them?

c-16: ^ooh, you might like nostraightanswer! their sound is so awesome

g-7: ^I've had their song “wishing well” on repeat. I find it soothing, it’s been keeping me going this year.
^if you listen to it you'll see! if you need a pressure valve from the rush of the city it might help
^plus, it has beautiful lyrics. I think about them all the time
^anyway sorry to head out so soon but I have to finish up this post and head off to work, I got stuck with the graveyard again rip
^your school library has a graveyard shift??
^oh I work off campus now! so yeah crazy hours
^bummer… maybe they’re hiring somewhere else on campus?
^I checked but all the on campus jobs are taken actually
^yeah but I really do have to go now, you should look up the song!
g-8: ^definitely! I should probably get some sleep
^maybe I’ll listen to nostraightanswer’s song while I crawl into bed
